Corporate Executives are among the biggest decision makers in the world with unparalleled access to funding. Yet they remain one of the most un-served communities by AI advancements. ZeroError.ai is a game changing AI platform providing actionable insights at unprecedented speed while addressing the common challenges of data inconsistencies, errors, and fraud.

Our headquarters are in NY and part of our team is based in Europe. We are a diverse team of business executives, engineers and researchers with a passion for creating true data-driven organizations.
